plot outline: Nayak (Narsing Makkala) is a sincere police officer. Vashikaran (Indrasena), Tony (Sameer Datta), Saketh (Karthik Reddy) and Kamaraju (Chakri Maganti) are the best friends. Pragna (Shubhangi Pant), her boy friend Ashrith (Syed Sohel Ryan)) and Stella (Sophiya Singh) are also the common friends to them. Vasi, Tony, Saketh and Kamudu enjoy the girls together and spoil their lives without evidence. Vashikaran is a novel writer and he write crime stories. Unexpectedly Pragna died in road accident. The case of Pragna's death was handled by a circle Inspector Mr. Nayak. Nayak strongly suspects that four are the accused who are the best friends to Pragna. Nayak in further investigation clarifies and arrests them. One of the Victim's Father is a prominent politician will be able to handle the court case and manages to discard the case against them. Process of continues investigation Nayak found Stella's dead body in the city outskirts. Stella (Sophyia Singh) is a social worker. Steven (Gary tantony) father of Stella came to Nayak and request to find the reason behind the Stella murder. Government suspended Nayak from police duty because he failed to provide proper evidences to magistrate court. With all his continuous efforts finally he got the justice.
title: Super Sketch
plot: _Super Sketch_ (qv) is Investigative suspense thriller. It is a story about Cop and Culprits.

Nayak (Narsing Makkala) is a sincere police officer. Vashikaran (Indrasena), Tony (Sameer Datta), Saketh (Karthik Reddy) and Kamaraju (Chakri Maganti) are the best friends. Pragna (Shubhangi Pant), her boy friend Ashrith (Syed Sohel Ryan)) and Stella (Sophiya Singh) are also the common friends to them. Vasi, Tony, Saketh and Kamudu enjoy the girls together and spoil their lives without evidence. Vashikaran is a novel writer and he write crime stories. Unexpectedly Pragna died in road accident. The case of Pragna's death was handled by a circle Inspector Mr. Nayak. Nayak strongly suspects that four are the accused who are the best friends to Pragna. Nayak in further investigation clarifies and arrests them. One of the Victim's Father is a prominent politician will be able to handle the court case and manages to discard the case against them. Process of continues investigation Nayak found Stella's dead body in the city outskirts. Stella (Sophyia Singh) is a social worker. Steven (Gary tantony) father of Stella came to Nayak and request to find the reason behind the Stella murder. Government suspended Nayak from police duty because he failed to provide proper evidences to magistrate court. With all his continuous efforts finally he got the justice.::Tambireddy Surendrareddy
